title: Portrait of a Man
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Paul B. Ernst
provenance_text:
Arthur E. Braun [-1976], Pittsburgh, PA, by October 1973 until 1976 [1]; by descent to his daughter Mrs. Paul B. Ernst, Pittsburgh, PA; her gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1978.

Notes:
[1]. Mr. Braun lent a painting by Copley "Portrait of a Man" to the exhibition "Art in Residence: Art Privately Owned in the Pittsburgh Area" held at Carnegie Institute, October 1973-January 1974.

Under review by CGK
